Identification_Area.title: M3 Overview and Working with M3 Data

Citation_Information.author_list: Peter Isaacson, Sebastien Besse, Noah Petro, Jeff Nettles, and the M3 Team
Citation_Information.description: Slides from presentation on M3 data, including a high-level overview of the instrument and mission and some notes on data processing. Please note that portions of this presentation on L0 line prefix data and archive directory structure are deprecated by the PDS4 archive. It is unclear exactly when this presentation was given -- its metadata suggest that it was given at the Moon Mineralogy Mapper Data Workshop at the EPSC-DPS Joint Meeting in October 2011, but its title slide dates it in November. It is possible that these are simply a finalized version of those slides created by Isaacson et al. for the November 2011 PDS data delivery.

Modification_Detail.description: Creation of PDS4 label. PDF copied from PDS3 archive and converted to PDF/A.

External_Reference.reference_text: Peter Isaacson, Sebastien Besse, Noah Petro, Jeff Nettles, and the M3 Team (November 2011). M3 Overview and Working with M3 Data (presentation slides).
